background_description: The background depicts a vibrant aquatic environment, likely a coral reef, with deep blue water. Visible elements include dark purple and blue coral formations, and some green-tipped stony corals in the foreground. Another elongated, blurry fish with dark purple and yellow hues is partially visible in the upper background.
explanation: The image clearly shows a Copperband Butterflyfish with striking orange and white vertical stripes. Its bright coloration and distinct patterns make it stand out significantly against the blue water and varied coral background, indicating a complete absence of camouflage.
